name: Life Domain
description: Clerics of the Life Domain are dedicated to healing and protection, channeling divine energy to restore allies and sustain life against all odds.

1.name: Life Domain Spells
1.description: You always have certain spells prepared at specific cleric levels.

1.name: Bonus Proficiency
1.description: You gain proficiency with heavy armor.

1.name: Disciple of Life
1.description: Your healing spells restore additional hit points.

2.name: Channel Divinity: Preserve Life
2.description: You restore hit points to creatures of your choice within range, distributing healing as needed.

6.name: Blessed Healer
6.description: When you heal others with a spell, you regain hit points as well.

8.name: Divine Strike
8.description: Once on each of your turns when you hit with a weapon attack, you deal extra radiant damage.

17.name: Supreme Healing
17.description: When you would roll dice to restore hit points with a spell, you instead use the highest number possible for each die.
